Please tell me you are a troll... Because Annie is a (Noxian?) human child.
hate to say it, but annie is actually not a Noxian, as seen in this here link. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VURABxrboMM .she protects garen.{{champion:1}}

this video is from after she joined the League before that she was the daughter to The leaders of an outcast society known as the Gray Order: Gregori Hastur, the Gray Warlock, and his wife Amoline, the Shadow Witch. the Grey Order opposed noxus so her parents are not noxian

I didn't know for sure if she was Noxian or not, which is why I put in in brackets with a question mark. I just vaguely remember Noxus being mentioned in her lore, which I haven't read in a long time.

EDIT: Here, I got her lore.

> In the time shortly before the League, there were those within the sinister city-state of Noxus who did not agree with the evils perpetrated by the Noxian High Command. The High Command had just put down a coup attempt from the self-proclaimed Crown Prince Raschallion, and a crack down on any form of dissent against the new government was underway. These political and social outcasts, known as the Gray Order, sought to leave their neighbors in peace as they pursued dark arcane knowledge. The leaders of this outcast society were a married couple: Gregori Hastur, the Gray Warlock, and his wife Amoline, the Shadow Witch. Together they led an exodus of magicians and other intelligentsia from Noxus, resettling their followers beyond the Great Barrier to the northern reaches of the unforgiving Voodoo Lands. Though survival was a challenge at times, the Gray Order's colony managed to thrive in a land where so many others would have failed.
> 
> Years after the exodus, Gregori and Amoline had a child: Annie. Early on, Annie's parents knew there was something special about their daughter. At the age of two, Annie miraculously ensorcelled a shadow bear - a ferocious denizen of the petrified forests outside the colony - turning it into her pet. To this day she keeps her bear ''Tibbers'' by her side, often keeping him spellbound as a stuffed doll to be carried like a child's toy. The combination of Annie's lineage and the dark magic of her birthplace have given this little girl tremendous arcane power. It is this same girl who now finds herself as one of the most sought-after champions within the League of Legends - even by the city-state that would have exiled her parents had they not fled beforehand.

Even though her parents fled from Noxus, she is still a Noxian.

No she's an adult Yordle. She's from Bandle City. That's a fake lore. the real one goes like this:

Annie is a Yordle. She is from Bandle City. She likes to throw fireballs and kill stuff in her free time.
This was a cool read. Good job

Id like to take this opportunity while you have spot light on teemo.

Ive noticed alot of players dont like him and are starting to refuse to play against a teemo or even WITH a teemo on the same side.

ive had some time to think that maybe yes... make a new skin along the lines of perhaps a championship teemo or pentakill style teemo or even make a cute female version of him ?(Just a thought)

ive also put some thought into his Q ability. blind ? yes thats fine. all attributes this ability has are fine.
but the only thing i have thought about that could be changed about it perhaps turning it into a skill shot.
such as nidalees Q
having to use it as a skill shot also lowers the risk of being blinded
perhaps a change of the animation it  makes on impact.. Could it be turned into an explosion aswell as the impact on mushrooms. I believe (personal belief) that this can make him seem more destructive ?

I think this will have a positive impact on the gameplay community and even out the hatred towards the little guy.
Yes man yes, this is the nerf {{champion:17}} needs

No it isn't. Just cause he is annoying does not mean he is OP. I mean, how many games have you been in where a Teemo hyper-carries to victory? A nerf to Teemo will just make him more under powered than he already is.

So now you're making it so teemo can't fight you within a minion wave? Do you really struggle that much against him?
